content.question: Which of the following statements is supported by the data in the information graphic?

choices.label: The use of executive orders has increased since 1945.
Democratic presidents issued more executive orders than Republican presidents did between 1945 and 2016.
The use of executive orders peaked in the 1970s and has since decreased.
Presidents have tended to prefer executive orders to signing statements since 1945.

content.answer: Democratic presidents issued more executive orders than Republican presidents did between 1945 and 2016.

topic.text: 2.4: Roles and Powers of the President

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe patterns and trends in data.
